stanza.line: From you have I been absent in the (a)spring(/a)
When proud-pied April (dressed in all his (b)trim)(/b)
Hath put a spirit of youth in every (a)thing(/a)
That heavy Saturn laughed and leaped with (b)him(/b)
Yet nor the lays of birds nor the sweet (c)smell(/c)
Of different flowers in odour and in (d)hue(/d)
Could make me any summer's story (c)tell(/c)
Or from their proud lap pluck them where they (d)grew(/d)
Nor did I wonder at the lily's (e)white(/e)
Nor praise the deep vermilion in the (f)rose(/f)
They were but sweet but figures of (e)delight(/e)
Drawn after you you pattern of all (f)those(/f)
Yet seemed it winter still and you (g)away(/g)
As with your shadow I with these did (g)play(/g)
